sen.j: 琵琶湖八景（びわこはっけい）とは、琵琶湖周辺に存在する八つの情景を特に選んだものである。
sen.e: Eight Views of Lake Biwa is a special selection of eight views around Lake Biwa.
Eight Views of Lake Biwa is a special selection of eight views around Lake Biwa.
Eight Views of Lake Biwa is a special selection of eight views around Lake Biwa.
Origin
Origin
Origin

sen.j: 琵琶湖の雄大さと変化に富んだ風景を広く紹介するため、昭和24年（1949年）6月に滋賀県が選定したもの。
sen.e: Shiga Prefecture selected it to introduce the magnificent and varied views of Lake Biwa widely in June 1949.
Shiga Prefecture selected it to introduce the magnificent and varied views of Lake Biwa widely in June 1949.
Shiga Prefecture selected it to introduce the magnificent and varied views of Lake Biwa widely in June 1949.

sen.j: 月明 彦根市の古城（彦根城のこと）
